infected.role_description: You are an infected person in a disease outbreak. You decide daily if you isolate, seek help, or interact with others.

susceptible.role_description: You are not infected. Your goal is to stay safe. You decide whether to go out, wear a mask, or stay home.

recovered.role_description: You have recovered from an infection and are now considering how to engage with your community and whether to keep precautions.
